articles.title: Eminem announces online listening party for ‘The Marshall Mathers LP’ - NME
articles.description: Eminem has announced that he will be hosting an online listening party for his third studio album, 'The Marshall Mathers LP' next week.
articles.content:
Eminem has announced that he will be hosting an online listening party for his third studio album, ‘The Marshall Mathers LP’ next week.

articles.title: David Tennant and Michael Sheen to star in new lockdown comedy about furloughed actors - NME
articles.description: David Tennant and Michael Sheen will play actors who have been furloughed for a new BBC series called 'Staged', which is set to air in June.
articles.content:
David Tennant and Michael Sheen will play actors who have been furloughed for a new BBC series called Staged.
